term.title: isolampsic point

notes.item: The term derives from the Greek words isos: equal, and lampein: to emit light or to shine. Isolampsic is thus parallel to isosbestic.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 358 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
